column1: Kata Robata////Hubbs enjoyed the beef tongue cooked two ways - I gave in and tried some tongue
column2: but I couldn't get the visual image out of my head. Yes
column4: but have a hard time with organ meats and things like that. It's just a mental block
column5: but one that I couldn't get over. The pieces of tongue were very thinly sliced and flavorful
column6: though a little gamey for my taste. Not tough at all
column8: but the Hubbs was happy to finish the entire dish.
